plot: Shoaib is alone caring for his ailing daughter because of the absence of his wife. Can Shoaib balance the performance of his job and attention to his daughter?
title: Beilun
plot_es: Shoaib is alone caring for his ailing daughter because of the absence of his wife. Can Shoaib balance the performance of his job and attention to his daughter?
plot_en: Shoaib is alone caring for his ailing daughter because of the absence of his wife. Can Shoaib balance the performance of his job and attention to his daughter?
